title: 128 - A Matter of Blood Part 2
description:
The battle for the soul of Dana Cardinal takes a turn.

The voice of Dana Cardinal is Jasika Nicole.

Weather: “Lemonade in the Shade” by Jeff Scroggins & Colorado
http://jeffscrogginsandcolorado.com/

Night Vale Presents Birthday Party, June 8th at the Bell House in New York City. Tickets on sale now.
http://www.welcometonightvale.com/live

Brand new “Who’s A Good Boy?” poster on our store.

Music: Disparition
http://disparition.info

Logo: Rob Wilson
http://robwilsonwork.com

Written by Joseph Fink & Jeffrey Cranor. Narrated by Cecil Baldwin.
